elements.title: lang::report_3_users_online::local_kopere_bi
elements.commandsql:
SELECT lastip
    FROM mdl_local_kopere_bi_online
   WHERE currenttime > UNIX_TIMESTAMP() - (5 * 60)
GROUP BY userid, lastip

elements.title: lang::report_3_users_online_list::local_kopere_bi
elements.commandsql:
SELECT DISTINCT 
       u.id AS u_id,
       u.firstname,
       u.lastname,
       kbo.city_name,
       kbo.country_name
  FROM mdl_local_kopere_bi_online kbo
  JOIN mdl_user u ON u.id = kbo.userid
 WHERE kbo.currenttime > UNIX_TIMESTAMP() - (5 * 60)

elements.title: lang::report_3_course_access_time::local_kopere_bi
elements.commandsql:
SELECT c.fullname,
          count(DISTINCT kbo.userid) AS 'lang::num_user::local_kopere_bi',
          SUM(kbo.seconds)           AS 'lang::seconds::local_kopere_bi'
     FROM mdl_course c
LEFT JOIN mdl_local_kopere_bi_online kbo ON kbo.courseid = c.id
    WHERE kbo.currenttime > UNIX_TIMESTAMP() - (30 * 24 * 60 * 60)
 GROUP BY c.id

elements.title: lang::report_3_top_browsers::local_kopere_bi
elements.commandsql:
SELECT kbo.client_name,
         SUM(kbo.seconds) as times
    FROM mdl_local_kopere_bi_online kbo
    JOIN mdl_user c ON c.id = kbo.userid
GROUP BY kbo.client_name
ORDER BY times DESC
   LIMIT 15

elements.title: lang::report_3_operating_systems::local_kopere_bi
elements.commandsql:
SELECT kbo.os_name,
         SUM(kbo.seconds) as times
    FROM mdl_local_kopere_bi_online kbo
    JOIN mdl_user c ON c.id = kbo.userid
GROUP BY kbo.os_name
ORDER BY times DESC
   LIMIT 15

elements.title: lang::report_3_top_country_access::local_kopere_bi
elements.commandsql:
SELECT CONCAT(kbo.city_name, '/', kbo.country_name) AS country_name, 
         SUM(kbo.seconds) as times
    FROM mdl_local_kopere_bi_online kbo
    JOIN mdl_user c ON c.id = kbo.userid
GROUP BY kbo.city_name, kbo.country_name
ORDER BY times DESC
   LIMIT 10
